title: Basilica of Saint-Denis: Newly discovered graves bring back the past
description: Excavations prior to the reconstruction of the Gothic building's north tower and spire have uncovered hundreds of anonymous graves dating from the 5th to the 14th century.

title: Examining MRIs of the brains of bilingual people reading
description: In English-Chinese bilinguals, some very small brain areas are only activated when reading Chinese words. This specialization does not exist in the brain of English-French bilinguals, according to a French team.
